sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The function of OperationCycleMenagement module is to recognize & validate Driving Cycle(DCY) and Warm Up Cycle(WUC). OperationCycleMenagement module decrement the Aging Counter for DTCs and to increment aging counter for CAN message Diagnose_01. and it will monitor the OBD_DrivingCycle and it returns/writes the OBD_DrivingCycle State to NvM.
